#summary Help for Project Logos.

= Introduction =

You can now customize your project pages with your own logo!

  * The image file should be in PNG, JPG or GIF format and a maximum of 153 x 55 pixels. Larger images will be scaled automatically.
  * The logo will be shown on the upper left of every page in your project, instead of the default Google Code logo.
  * Do not include any Google trademarks.


= Troubleshooting =

  * Make sure that your image is in PNG, GIF, or JPG format.
